name: Underworld-The Purge Day
description: An underworld strategy mobile game, a game of guns, domination, power, money and organized crime. As the main protagonist,install yourself as the boss of the leading Cartel in this criminals’ heaven, the vice city. Dive into criminals’ world: purge your enemies on streets, make money via casino, secure your position, rule with your iron fist and train your future successor. The future of a kingdom lies in every decision you make.
